amendment.description: To require a report on the economic and infrastructure effects on airports of collegiate aviation flight training operations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3903 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3903 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3903 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 3896.
